name: Peaceful Quy Nhon sea city!
description: Binh Dinh is the land where I was born and grew up. After studying in Saigon, I have traveled to many places in Vietnam, then I realized I want to come back to my hometown and experience more about the Central Vietnamese culture (the Central Vietnam includes the Central Highland and the Central Coast). I love my hometown and I would like to share with you its hidden beauties.
